resources.string:
KRemote allows to use Japanese GRemote 
Press any button in GRemote to connect, you only need to open this app the first time.Kremote auto-starts when Karoo starts, then push a button in GRemote and wait until GRemote flashing green several times.

Accessibility has to be enabled (mandatory), if you didn't allow, you've to stop app (o reinstall) and allow it.
